commitResults.messageBody:
AboutUs.d not filled

Reflect correct particulars

Updated profile picture, personal particulars and skeletal PPP

Wrong GitHub Actions build status badge link

Correctly reflect our project build status

Updated to our project build status badge

Developer Guide is outdated and needs to be updated with information on HustleBook

In order to reflect accurate information on our product

Let's update use case for deleting a client
This adds my details to AboutUs.md and creates a file with my project contributions in the team folder.

Updates the user guide to include description of the following commands:
Editing of the clients meeting date using the client's name and
Deleting the client info using the client's name.
Adds brackets to my GitHub and portfolio links in my profile.
Adds attribution to the author who created the icon used for Hustlebook.
Adds the use case for the edit command.
This updates and formats the developer guide.
This splits the two extensions under UC01 (Extension 1c) to extensions 1c and 1d.
Formats the bullet points to standardize the guide.

Updates the GUI to reflect the correct app name and icon.

Updates the icon image test method to check with the new HustleBook icon.
Also added kuanjr.md and renamed jr.png to kuanjr.png

commitResults.messageBody: Developer Guide missing use case for `tag` command.

index.md and DevOps.md currently contains badges for address book 3.

Updated current badges to reflect new badges for HustleBook.

Current still reflects AddressBook.

Updated to show HustleBook.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add extension to `tag` command and update indentation
commitResults.messageBody:
Missing extension for `tag` command for clients with the same name.
Indentation was not consistent.

Added extension. Fix indentation to 4 spaces for all.

commitResults.messageBody:
"Use case ends" is currently displayed on the previous line.

Added additional line before this lines.

commitResults.messageTitle: Update title of UC03 to use imperative language

commitResults.messageBody: Changed Hustlebook to HustleBook for consistency

Add my profile picture and details about myself.

Add Skeletal PPP: ad-nap.md. Content to be changed in the future.

ReadMe content is about AB3.

Let's change content of ReadMe.md to describe HustleBook.

UserGuide.md contains user guide for AB3.

Let's change the content to match HustleBook for description, list and
adding a client feature.

Develop guide is incomplete and contains information regarding
AB3 and not HustleBook.

Let's,
* edit table of content
* add use case for add command
* edit target user profile
* edit value proposition
* edit user stories
* edit non-functional requirements
* edit glossary

commitResults.messageTitle: Person object does not contain needed attributes for a client.
commitResults.messageBody:
Client requires an attribute to capture essential information
and last met up date.

Let's,
* add Info class and PrevDateMet class
* add Info and PrevDateMet as attributes for Person class
* modified add command feature to accept the new syntax prefixes
* modified test files to fit with the new attributes

Users of HustleBook can now add in info using i/ in CLI and
add previous date met using d/ with "YYYY-MM-DD" format.

Note:
* Test cases for both classes not implemented
* Require discussion regarding PrevDateMet (to save as
String or LocalDate)
* Require discussion regarding i/ and d/ if it is an optional input

commitResults.messageTitle: Add command message usage and example is not updated with the new prefix of flag, info and previous date met
commitResults.messageBody:
User would need to know the new command format if they enter the
wrong format.

Let's change the message usage to address the new command format with
example that showcases all three pre-fix that were implemented.

This should close #52.

commitResults.messageTitle: Test cases for PrevDateMet not implemented
commitResults.messageBody:
Regression testing should be implemented to avoid future bugs when
implementing other features.
A bug found in ParserUtil needs to be squished ASAP.

Let's,
* implement the correct regular expression for PrevDateMet.
* add test cases for PrevDateMet using JUnit5 testing.
* fix the bug found in ParserUtil

This should close #51.

commitResults.messageTitle: Default date is set to 2022-03-14 as a temporary fix
commitResults.messageBody:
Default date of previous date met should be set to date of when
the client is being added into HustleBook. Default value of info
of an empty string can be counterintuitive when displayed in the
HustleBook.

Let's,
* change the default value of date to the current date of adding
client.
* change the default value of info to No further info.
